rules.description: Ctrl+Left Arrow → Cmd+Left Arrow (Move to beginning of line) - Exclude Terminals
Ctrl+Right Arrow → Cmd+Right Arrow (Move to end of line) - Exclude Terminals
Cmd+E → Ctrl+E (End of line in Terminals)
Cmd+A → Ctrl+A (Beginning of line in Terminals)
Ctrl+Left Arrow → Option+Left Arrow (Word nav in Terminals)
Ctrl+Right Arrow → Option+Right Arrow (Word nav in Terminals)
